formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Ocarina of Time 3D
description:
Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D
is an unforgettable classic from the
Nintendo 64 console, reborn on
Nintendo 3DS. Enjoy Zelda 3D and
enter the land of Hyrule in this action
adventure andembark on a quest
through time to combat evil!
name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Ocarina of Time 3D
